author: jmcnally
msg: do not return the key to the pool if it was passed into the method.  The
calling method should be responsible for returning the key to the pool.
Also make sure to remove the group name from the set of active groups, if it

author: jmcnally
msg: throw an exception if a key is returned to the pool multiple times (before
being borrowed again).  This should not happen any longer, but it could help
in debugging if the problem arises again.
